Text: It's alright sir. Thank you again for uploading. Truly appreciate it.
How do i configure this with recruit a friend?

Tfdanielx, if you really want to, go to the Zygor options and select the options to automatically accept and turn in quests on the RAF account (assuming you're multiboxing).

Then, bind "interact with target" to a key, as well as make a macro that targets the target of your focus target (the focus target should always be your main). This will save you a headache.
OK thanks for the response. Im not multiboxing or anything, its just that I thought there was a setting that the guide took into account your 3X exp and automatically adjusted the quests and stuff.
On Zygors website its called the Smart Injection System. I was just wondering if this version had it. Great addon either way, thanks for the upload!
